en: Project RESERVOIR - AMR nosocomial transmission dynamics
ko: 프로젝트 RESERVOIR - AMR 병원 내 전파 역학 연구
fr: Projet RESERVOIR - dynamiques de transmission nosocomiale AMR

en: Solving optimal control problems related to the menstrual cycle
Applying multi-objective optimization algorithms and mathematical optimization techniques
ko: 생리 주기와 관련된 최적 제어 문제 해결
다목적 최적화 알고리즘 및 수학적 최적화 기법 적용
fr: Résolution de problèmes de contrôle optimal liés au cycle menstruel
Application d'algorithmes d'optimisation multi-objectifs et de techniques d'optimisation mathématique

en: Automated the generation of synthetic datasets for autonomous driving and robotic tasks such as navigation and manipulation
Developed and maintained simulators including CARLA and Spear, which are agent-based modeling (ABM) environments
ko: 자율주행 및 로봇의 내비게이션·조작 과제를 위한 합성 데이터셋 생성 자동화
CARLA, Spear 등 ABM 기반 시뮬레이터 개발 및 유지보수
fr: Automatisation de la génération de jeux de données synthétiques pour la conduite autonome et les tâches robotiques (navigation et manipulation)
Développement et maintenance de simulateurs tels que CARLA et Spear, basés sur la modélisation multi-agents (ABM)

en: Thesis: 'Comparisons and Optimizations of Controls Using Transmission Models' (Best Thesis Award)
Developed mathematical (ODE, PDE, stochastic) and agent-based models for various systems including VZV, COVID-19, rotavirus, contact networks, cell dynamics, and oncolytic viruses
Analyzed 2020–2021 Korean contact survey data in conjunction with infectious disease dynamics
Applied optimal control algorithms to derive practical and continuous treatment strategies
ko: 논문 제목: 'Comparisons and Optimizations of Controls Using Transmission Models' (최우수 논문상 수상)
VZV, COVID-19, 로타바이러스, 접촉 네트워크, 세포 구조, 종양용해바이러스 등을 설명하기 위한 수학적 모델(ODE, PDE, 확률론적 모델) 및 에이전트 기반 모델 개발
2020–2021년 한국 접촉 조사 데이터를 질병 동역학과 함께 분석
현실적이고 연속적인 최적 치료 전략을 도출하기 위한 최적 제어 알고리즘 적용
fr: Thèse : « Comparisons and Optimizations of Controls Using Transmission Models » (Prix de la meilleure thèse)

Développement de modèles mathématiques (EDO, EDP, stochastiques) et de modèles à base d'agents pour divers systèmes : VZV, COVID-19, rotavirus, réseaux de contact, dynamiques cellulaires, virus oncolytiques
Analyse des données d'enquêtes coréennes sur les contacts sociaux (2020–2021) en lien avec la dynamique des maladies infectieuses
Application d'algorithmes de contrôle optimal pour élaborer des stratégies de traitement pratiques et continues

ongoingProject.name: Optimizing oral contraceptive timing: Morning intake reduces doses and enhances efficacy
